title: There’s a New Source for Meat Substitutes: Fungi
text:
The race to produce high-tech meat alternatives has taken two directions. First, there are companies like Beyond Meat and Gardein, which are making burgers and other meat-like products from plants. Second, companies such as Memphis Meats are trying to grow meat in labs from animal cells.

But now, a new class of entrepreneurs has emerged with a different approach: Startups such as Prime Roots, Emergy Foods and Ecovative Design LLC are developing meat substitutes from fungi, a group of organisms that includes mushrooms, mold...
description: Startups say fungus-based protein has many benefits over alternatives.
